## blockRendering.Renderer.init() method

Initialize the renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
init(theme: Theme, opt_rendererOverrides?: {
        [rendererConstant: string]: any;
    }): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [Theme](./blockly.theme_class.md) | The workspace theme object. |
|  opt\_rendererOverrides | { \[rendererConstant: string\]: any; } | _(Optional)_ Rendering constant overrides. |
